explains: n. 智慧，才智；明智；学问，知识；普遍看法
wordGroup: conventional wisdom 传统智慧，传统观点；世俗认知

sentences.en: They were godlike in their wisdom and compassion.
sentences.cn: 他们的智慧和关爱有如圣贤一般。

sentences.en: In this job you need to exhibit the wisdom of Solomon.
sentences.cn: 做这份工作需要表现出所罗门王一样的才智。

sentences.en: Some would question the wisdom of leaving her out of the team.
sentences.cn: 有些人会问，把她排除在团队之外是否明智。
